attributes.action: Invoke article 50 of the lisbon treaty as instructed by the british people
attributes.additional_details: My personal opinion is that the people have no more faith in politics and after the carrying on of both leave and remain camps im disgusted. If you fail to fulfil this promise i will have no faith in politics anymore do not let this be the death of british politics for your own personal ambitions.
attributes.background: I find it alarming how much of a divide the wait is causing between british people. People are beginning to identify as remain or leave, there is also an alarming amount of ageism coming from the remain side. I emplor the goverment to fulfil its promise and issue article 50 as promised.
